DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine whether supplementation new high-protein oral supplement improve evolution functional parameter elderly patient nurse home .
DOC.brief_title: Effect New High-protein Oral Supplement Functional Parameters Patients Nursing Homes
DOC.criteria: Man woman age 60 year old Living nursing home least 2 month Malnourished risk malnutrition ( MNA < 23.5 BMI < 24 albumin < 35 g/l weight loss 5 kg last 6 month ) Without dementia moderate dementia ( MMSE > =10/30 ) Able walk without human assistance ( technical assistance allow ) No vitamin D supplementation Able follow study procedure agree consume oral supplement Severe dementia ( MMSE < 10/30 ) Enteral nutrition Severe renal hepatic impairment Cancer chemotherapy Uncontrolled diabetes Lactose intolerance Cow 's milk protein allergy
